# Vertigo (Spell)
## Overview
[[Illusion Spells|Illusion]] ([[Phantasm Spells|phantasm]]) \[[[Fear Spells|fear]], [[Mind-Affecting Spells|mind-affecting]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Bard Spells|Bard 2]], [[2nd Level Beguiler Spells|Beguiler 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** One living creature

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** Will disbelief

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Player's Handbook II (WotC), pg. 127

*You cripple a target with sensations of falling.*

The subject of this spell becomes dizzy as the ground seems to drop away beneath its feet. The subject must succeed on a DC 10 [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] (3.5 Balance) check at the start of each turn to take a move action. If it fails, it cannot move. If it fails the check by 5 or more, it falls prone. While affected, the subject also takes a â€“2 penalty on attack rolls and saving throws. Airborne creatures receive a +4 bonus on saves against this spell and do not need to make the [[Acrobatics (Skill)|Acrobatics]] (3.5 Balance) checks.
